body.name: Bubs Supreme Follow-On Formula, Stage 2, Infants 6-12 Months, Made with A2 Beta-Casein Protein Cows Milk, 28.2 oz
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 12 mins
features: NUTRITIONALLY SAFE: Bubs Supreme Follow-On Formula Stage 2 is an Australian-made baby formula exclusively formulated for tiny tummies ages 6-12 months, feeding 4 times per day, all while made to ensure safety, quality, purity, and nutrition

PURE & BALANCED: Our Bubs Supreme is premium and naturally sourced farm fresh A2 beta-casein protein milk of the highest quality from Australia, proudly sourced from our high-quality farmers committed to care

GOODNESS FROM THE FARM: Bubs Supreme Stage 2 Infant Formula is securely blended, with Clean Label, non-GMO ingredients, no artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives, and selected for Clean Label Purity Award

NO HIDDEN NASTIES: Our Bubs Supreme Infant Formula gives parents peace of mind and babies a happy start to their life with natural A2 beta-casein protein cow's milk, along with a symbiotic blend of Probiotics and Prebiotics, Lutein, and Omega 3

TRUSTED FOR OVER 17 YEARS: Founder Kristy Carr, a mom of three, has a mission to inspire the next generation of happy babies, with Clean Label nutritional products that provide the foundation for setting up a lifetime of good eating habits
body.description: Our most advanced, premium formulation, our Bubs Supreme Follow-On Formula Stage 2 is exclusively formulated for babies 6-12 months, with farm fresh A2 beta-casein protein cow's milk and combines essential scientifically researched nutrients, to support the nutritional needs of your growing baby. Each of our farmers are carefully selected to meet strict quality control and transparency protocols. Our Bubs manufacturing facilities comply with all Australian State & Federal Regulatory and export quality control requirements. Our Bubs formula products are produced in our Bubs-owned and controlled manufacturing facility in Australia, including our Aussie Bubs Toddler Formulas and rigorously tested before being approved for release. At Aussie Bubs, our mission is to create new generations of happy bubs, with Clean Label nutritional products that provide the foundation for setting up a lifetime of good eating habits.

MADE IN AUSTRALIA Proudly Australian Made and Owned, with certified organic milk sourced from Australia. MOM FOUNDED AND APPROVED Clean Label Australian made products without additives commonly found in other formulas. Giving families peace of mind and bubs a happy and healthy start to life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby loves it
reviews.reviewText: My baby has had tummy issues since he was born, this formula is the only one he’s been able to do well with. Love the option for quick shipping as their website takes a while to ship things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for my spituppy ‘lil man!
reviews.reviewText: We have a five month old and when I tell you that I did a ton of research before picking a formula I am not kidding! The formula I had originally chosen comes out of the UK and I got it from Target. He constantly had gas, hiccups and spit up. I went through probably 5-6 different formulas before finding Bub’s. These guys are the best and my little man has grown so much and has gas/hiccups a LOT less even though he still occasionally gets them. So happy with this find ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Totally recommend this formula to your baby’s

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: worth money to buy for baby

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best Formula on the market
reviews.reviewText: This is simply the best formula on the market. We were apprehensive about switching to formula from breast milk, but we have seen nothing but great results from this formula. Our baby girl has had no spit ups or upset stomachs from this formula. It has been a seamless transition and we couldn’t be happier with Aussie Bubs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We started feeding our 6 month old son this formula after Similac recalled their premixed formula. Our son has taken this formula for the past 5 months and he loves it. Great stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Needs better design
reviews.reviewText: My baby loves this formula. It seems easy to digest. It smells better (less fishy) than some American brands. My only complaint is the spoon, which is buried in the formula. Do they really expect people to dig it out from the formula? It’s poor hygiene. I would recommend making a smaller spoon, adding a holder on the inside of the lid, and putting the spoon there, which is how Kendamil cans are designed. I like that design way better. Other than that, I highly recommend this formula.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars We prefer the Grass Fed version
reviews.reviewText: We bought this while on vacation because it was more reasonably priced than the organic grass fed version of Bubs. We noticed a little more spit up and my daughter doesn’t seem to like it as much as the other version.
